label: Carvalho, Marcelo R. De.  2016. Potamotrygon rex, a new species of Neotropical freshwater stingray  (Chondrichthyes: Potamotrygonidae) from the middle and upper rio  Tocantins, Brazil, closely allied to Potamotrygon henlei (Castelnau, 1855) . Zootaxa 4150(5): 537–565.
value: Carvalho, Marcelo R. De.  2016. Potamotrygon rex, a new species of Neotropical freshwater stingray  (Chondrichthyes: Potamotrygonidae) from the middle and upper rio  Tocantins, Brazil, closely allied to Potamotrygon henlei (Castelnau, 1855) . Zootaxa 4150(5): 537–565.
title: Potamotrygon rex, a new species of Neotropical freshwater stingray (Chondrichthyes: Potamotrygonidae) from the middle and upper rio Tocantins, Brazil, closely allied to Potamotrygon henlei (Castelnau, 1855)
